The '''Tulaytullah Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]], themed after the ancient civilization of [[Tulaytullah]].

This series does not have a shared ability bonus. The weapons in this series do share base attack values and an [[Elemental Mastery]] secondary stat.
